short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts Facebook ID, Page ID, or Post ID from Facebook URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Facebook ID Extractor is a handy tool designed to quickly extract unique Facebook IDs from various Facebook URLs. Whether you need to extract a Facebook Profile ID, Page ID, Group ID, or Post ID, this extension is perfect for you, saving you valuable time.


Key Features:

Extract any Facebook ID: Effortlessly obtain Facebook Profile IDs, Page IDs, Group IDs, or Post IDs from any Facebook URL.

Quick and Easy: Simply paste the Facebook URL in the extension and quickly obtain the corresponding ID, eliminating your efforts to search for the ID manually and saving you valuable time.

Supports all Facebook URLs: The extension works with all personal profiles, public pages, groups, and posts.


Why Choose Facebook ID Extractor?

Accurate and Reliable: The tool ensures you get precise IDs every time, eliminating the hassle of manually finding them.

Free and Lightweight: No need for bulky software; this extension is free, quick to install, and easy to use.

Ideal for Various Applications: Perfect for social media management, data analysis, marketing automation, Facebook API integration, and much more.


How It Works:

Install the extension and pin it to your browser.

Copy any Facebook URL (profile, page, group, or post).

Paste it into the extension and click "Extract."

Instantly get the unique ID for your specific use.


Disclaimer

Facebook™ is a trademark of Facebook Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. The Facebook ID Extractor is an independent project developed by Random Tools and has no official connection with Facebook™ or Facebook Inc.

This extension is not officially developed or endorsed by Facebook™.
